Each box is curated for your dietary needs. Vegan? GF, low carb? No problem. Find your perfect https://tastermonial.com/pages/tasterbox-quiz

nodes.excerpt: Verso is a universal mobile cashback application available on iOS and android. Verso rewards user's purchases made from the app in BTU cryptocurrency. BTU can be redeemed into any gift card of the user's choice inside the app.
nodes.title: Verso - Earn free crypto as cashback
nodes.author: Verso

nodes.excerpt: They say don't judge a book by its cover... What about movies? uFlix takes movie nights and turns the decision process into an enjoyable social experience to have with friends, family or partners!
nodes.title: uFlix - Choose what to watch in a hassle free manner
nodes.author: James Jones

nodes.excerpt: appfleet is an edge compute platform that allows people to deploy their web applications globally. Instead of running your code in a single centralized location you can now run it everywhere, at the same time. Get better performance, latency and uptime!
nodes.title: appfleet - Edge compute for containerized services & deploy global apps
nodes.author: Dmitriy A.

nodes.excerpt: We built this product to let you receive your packages at a nearby pickup point...no more worrying about package theft, missed deliveries, or planning your day around when the delivery man is coming. We have ~1,000 locations all around the country.
nodes.title: Bounce Package Acceptance - Ship your packages to a nearby shop
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: With DesignTern we give you a platform to explore a list of Design Internships openings from the biggest companies around the world. You can also use DesignTern to post your own Design Internship opening for your company.
nodes.title: DesignTern - Easily Explore & Apply to Design Internships
nodes.author: AJ Picard

nodes.excerpt: YoMo is an open-source Streaming Serverless Framework for building low-latency edge computing applications. Built atop QUIC transport protocol and functional reactive programming interface, it makes real-time data processing reliable, secure, and easy.
nodes.title: YoMo - A serverless framework for latency sensitive applications

nodes.excerpt: ISP Logger is an automated internet speed performance analytics tool. A small open source script performs a speed test on a docker image every hour and can be analysed on the easy to use Dashboard.
nodes.title: ISP Logger - Automated internet performance monitoring
